attributes.action: not allow an increase in Council Tax Prices!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is there going to be a 4% in council tax?  Surely we pay enough as it is...
We have the right to question this rise and ask them to justify why we are paying ridiculously high prices to live in own country?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
